This article provides a comprehensive guide on managing overgrown grass in public spaces in Gauteng, emphasizing the importance of safety and community involvement. It outlines practical steps for maintaining pavements, vacant lots, and parks, along with essential tools needed for the job.

Owls to the rescue in Alexandra

Johannesburg is implementing the Owl Box Project to combat a rat infestation in Alexandra township by introducing owls as natural predators. The initiative involves local schools and communities in educating them about the ecological benefits of owls while promoting responsible waste management practices.

Location: Johannesburg

ReadTime: 4 min
